gifts.name: In my capacity as Past Deputy Governor of the Honourable Irish Society and as the cuurent Chairman of the Co-operation Ireland GB Executive, I have regularly attended events hosted by Dr Christopher Moran both personally and in his role as Chairman of Co-operation Ireland, the cost of which in total, is likely to have exceeded the cumulative registration threshhold.
